thread.section_title: Servicecaster Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Servicecaster | servicecaster.com | 3 of 120
thread.title: Thomas

author: Thomas
title: Thomas
text: The casters on my extra heavy table saw wore out. I searched online for replacements and found several companies carried 150 pound capacity casters. That is what I already had and they just weren't heavy enough. Then I found Service Caster. They offered a 250 pound capacity caster. Just what I needed. I placed my order and they were shipped the next day.. I am 100% satisfied.
